result.execSummary:
The defendant Paula A Olson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse Assessments]. This is not a criminal offense and results only in a money penalty for this offense.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Partial payment plan:  $25.00 per month.  2 day(s) RCJ for contempt for failure to pay.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Paula A Olsen in court.  Lillian V. Lewis appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Elizabeth Kiel.  With CCV & AODA State rec:  ct 1 300+cc.  W/o rec probation.  Def corrects spelling of last name.  Olson.
BTC:  Appt atty.  Repay $25/mo begin 12-1-15  Status conference scheduled for November 30, 2015 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Paula A Olsen
Current: 3718 Republic Ave, Racine, WI 53405   (Effective: 10-30-2015)
Prior: 1104 High St, Racine, WI 53402
copy of letter from State Public Defender - not eligible

Pre-trial conference at 09-24-2015 03:15 pm.
Status conference at 10-30-2015 08:30 am.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:  It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any  alcohol.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.  The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.  No contact with the victim, JHG (person, property, residence or family).   Make all court appearances on time.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

Defendant Paula A Olsen in court with attorney Erin Joy Larsen.  Defendant Paula A Olsen in custody.  Gerad T Dougvillo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Lori Thornton.  Reading of complaint is waived, probable cause found, p-ng, bond set.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 24, 2015 at 03:15 pm.  Status conference scheduled for October 30, 2015 at 08:30 am.
